Package org.spongepowered.api.registry

Interface ScopedRegistryHolder

All Known Subinterfaces:
Client, ClientWorld, Engine, Game, LocalServer, Server, ServerWorld, World<W,​L>
public interface ScopedRegistryHolder
A holder of registries with a well defined scope that dictates the specificity of those registries.

See Game, Engine, and World
